ThoughtDef.label: vr: passing voices
ThoughtDef.description: Faint shared chatter floated through the pods. It was almost comforting.

li.description: Voices drifted across the network, brushing past without pulling me in.

li.text: The quiet murmur was enough. Nothing elaborate, just presence.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: linked with a friend
ThoughtDef.description: I felt a familiar friend on the other side of the dream.

li.description: We synced up mid-sim, sharing jokes only we would get.

li.text: I checked in on them, making sure they felt grounded.
We turned the sim into a private party.
Even a glitch felt like an in-joke between us.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: braided memories
ThoughtDef.description: Our dreams braided together like we were thinking with one voice.

li.description: We finished each other's thoughts inside the sim.

li.text: I kept checking their signal, terrified of losing the link.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: shared breath
ThoughtDef.description: Our pods hummed together; I could feel their breath in mine.

li.description: We drifted in lockstep, heartbeats phasing inside the sim.

li.text: I caught ghost echoes of others; it stung, even in VR.
The sim bent around us, carrying our pulse in its glow.
Nothing flashy—just warmth, breath, and shared silence.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: echo of family
ThoughtDef.description: I felt family lines pulsing through the network.

li.description: Memories layered—old lullabies under the simulation's hum.

li.text: I worried what the machine might do to us, together.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: signal clash
ThoughtDef.description: Our signals clashed inside the simulation.

li.description: The other presence grated on me. Even in VR, they were sand in the gears.

li.text: Every stray packet felt like another insult.
I imagined cutting their feed and silencing them.
I probed their reactions just to see what would break.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: empathic bleed
ThoughtDef.description: I absorbed someone else's mood—like feelings leaking through the wires.

li.description: Emotions bled through the sim until I couldn't tell which were mine.

li.text: I buffered their fear, keeping it from overwhelming them.
The link rang like a low psychic chord.

ThoughtDef.label: vr: psychic chord
ThoughtDef.description: A clean psychic chord hummed through the pods.

li.description: The whole network resonated; I could feel everyone, all at once.

li.text: The chord flared bright, almost musical.
I sensed the chord dimly, like listening through walls.
